overview:
Daniel is a communications & marketing executive in Los Angeles.

Daniel served on the early international communications team at Google in Silicon Valley, driving media relations activities, product communications, issues and litigation support and corporate communications in Asia-Pacific, Latin America and EMEA. While at Google he also worked on a wide spectrum of products and issues including its search and consumer services, enterprise technology (Google Search Appliance), advertising programs, corporate issues and policy communications, and ran the Google Zeitgeist program.

He holds an MA in communication from Gonzaga University. He is on faculty at UC Irvine Extension and teaches in their social media program, and serves on advisory boards for both the department of computer science at Santa Monica College and the social media program at UC Irvine Extension.
